about_the_game:
• THE FORGOTTEN AI

Hidden inside an old program somewhere lies Emily, a long forgotten AI, lonely. She seems to know way more than she lets on, it's up to you to discover what secrets she's hiding and to unearth the mysteries that reside deep within the program. How much does she really know? There are too many unaswered questions and the more you look the more seem to come up

  • CHAT WITH EMILY

In the game you'll have the opportunity to chat with Emily and although you don't know anything about her, she seems to know more than she lets on about you. Emily is willing to chat but sometimes your connection to the chatroom gets severed, if you wanto to uncover the truth you'll have to push trough and get her to tell you everything... but maybe there's another way to get some informations

  • SECRET CODES

The program also features a database with many secret files, each locked behind a code. Inside there's everything from messages to audio recordings and even video files. This codes could be anything, and each code is linked to the content of the file. The truth must be there somewhere so you'll have to try to figure out those codes. This files are old, left by someone who used to work on this program, someone linked to this whole thing, someone who knew the truth

name: Emily_

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Chat with a mysterious AI, uncover secret codes and find hidden files. Your choices may lead you to uncover different things, the only way to find the truth is through Emily and whatever was left inside the old computer. You need her help
